publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-761.4 Robin Harper: Improving Scotland's Homes-As an amendment to motion (S2M-761) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end "but notes that the report's recommendations are not in themselves sufficiently detailed and therefore will require further guidance on their interpretation and operation, along with adequate resourcing if the aspirations of the task force are to be realised."
